title: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Roll out the dough, spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella and basil. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake at 220°C for 10–12 minutes.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs with parmesan. Combine everything off-heat, season with pepper.

title: Risotto alla Milanese
instructions: Cook onion in butter, add rice and saffron. Gradually add stock until rice is creamy. Stir in parmesan.

title: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, grill or pan-fry. Simmer in tomato puree, butter, and cream until thick.

title: Chole Bhature
instructions: Cook chickpeas with spiced gravy. Fry bhature (deep-fried flatbread). Serve together.

title: Masala Dosa
instructions: Spread dosa batter on griddle, fill with spiced potato mixture. Serve with chutney and sambar.

title: Pho Bo
instructions: Prepare aromatic beef broth with spices. Cook rice noodles separately. Serve with beef slices, sprouts, and herbs.

title: Banh Mi
instructions: Stuff baguette with meat, pickles, herbs, chili, and mayo.

title: Ramen
instructions: Cook noodles. Simmer broth with soy sauce. Assemble bowl with noodles, broth, pork, egg, and spring onions.

title: Sushi Rolls
instructions: Roll seasoned rice with fillings in nori sheets. Slice and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Tacos al Pastor
instructions: Marinate pork with adobo spices, grill with pineapple. Serve on tortillas with onion and cilantro.

title: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocado with lime, onion, tomato, and cilantro. Season to taste.

title: Coq au Vin
instructions: Marinate chicken in wine. Braise with vegetables until tender.

title: Crème Brûlée
instructions: Make custard, bake in ramekins, chill. Caramelize sugar on top before serving.

title: Buffalo Wings
instructions: Fry wings, toss in sauce made with butter and hot sauce. Serve with celery and dip.

title: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Cook pasta, make cheese sauce with butter and milk. Mix, top with breadcrumbs, bake.

title: Meat Pie
instructions: Cook beef filling. Line pastry cases, add filling, top with pastry. Bake until golden.

title: Pavlova
instructions: Whip egg whites with sugar, bake meringue base. Top with cream and fruit.
